tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    severity ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High') NOT NULL,
    patch_status BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    patch_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerability (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255),
    severity_level VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    affected_system VARCHAR(100),
    patch_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patch (
    patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_name VARCHAR(255),
    patch_version VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE,
    applied_system VARCHAR(100),
    vulnerability_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerability(id)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255),
    severity_level VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    affected_system VARCHAR(100),
    published_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    patch_date DATE,
    applied_system VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_patches (
    vulnerability_id INT,
    patch_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY(vulnerability_id, patch_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patch_id) REFERENCES patches(id)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_tracking (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    patch_status VARCHAR(20),
    assigned_team VARCHAR(50),
    due_date DATE,
    completed_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255),
    cvss_score FLOAT,
    description TEXT,
    release_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patches (
    patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_name VARCHAR(255),
    vulnerability_id INT,
    patch_date DATE,
    applied BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE devices_vulnerabilities (
    device_id INT,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id, vulnerability_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patch_history (
    patch_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    patch_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (patch_id, device_id)
)
